name: ai-agent-marketplace
description: AI Agent Marketplace â€” single deploy

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: cd backend && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && node dist/server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
